context: Dental Fillings,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental Crowns,
review:
SP NIYOGI
One month ago
Visited for RCT - Root Canal Treatment & Dental Fillings
One month ago I visited Dr.Sridevi, Ivory Dental, for my dental issues.  The doctor gave me very patient listening.  Once the Doctor examined my teeth, said how those issues can be addressed by her and the associated specialist doctors.
The first visit was followed by three/four sittings with specialist doctors, who addressed my teeth issues with least pain.
The pain sensitivity, RCT and Dental Fillings are treated to my utmost satisfaction.  I thank Dr.Sridevi, Dr.Shankar and Dr.Chiranjeevi Reddy for their specialised services.
I strongly recommend my relatives and friends to get best treatment from Dr.Sridevi, Ivory Dental, for their dental issues.
